responses: SCI is the leading Bulk Carrier operator in India, managing 15 vessels of Handymax, Supramax, Panamax, and Kamsarmax sizes, averaging 9 years in age (8-10 years range), designed for India centric trade with global cross-trading capability for diverse cargo like iron ore and coal. For detailed information, please refer to the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicedetails/bulk-carriers

Passenger and cargo tickets for travel to and from the Andaman & Nicobar Islands are booked by the Andaman & Nicobar Administration, with details available on the A&N website: https://www.andaman.gov.in/
